channel.title: I'm New and well...Dont Understand somethings
channel.description:
Ok yes I am new just started today and I would like to make my own server and already have the downloads and all done just dont know how to import things...of course I thought i could use my like HTML brain but this is used my Java and I dont know that...yet...anyways
Can someone please answer my questions?
1. How to you have your server online and how do you well....get on it?
2. What is client.java? i see some codes and says Open Client.Java and well I dont know what that is so...What is it and where can i find it?
3. Where can you find a easy understanding Java Tutorial?
4. How does the whole putting monsters and everything where you want it work?
I'm sorry about asking I am just dont want to sit here stressed and not get anywhere when i could be learning something new! I would really like to start up this server for well...mostly for my family to play on and I told them about it and they are really excited and pumped so...I dont want to let them down...
Thank You!

item.title: I'm New and well...Dont Understand somethings
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.source: I'm New and well...Dont Understand somethings

item.title: I'm New and well...Dont Understand somethings
item.dc:creator: @runescape192 runescape192
item.description:
@runescape192 wrote:

1.) Look for a turioul

2.)After you download a source then there will be a sub title called client

3.)I will send you a good site and it has really good turiouls and other stuff about private servers, but don’t want leaches and noobs to start coming to it.

4.)open the npc, then make it so it has hp and see its id number. go to autospawn and set it somewhere.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm New and well...Dont Understand somethings
